reviews.review:
Being a man of science I use Portal 2 to test my new inventions like the Brain Amplifier with Virtual Reality helmets. Now only if Fry would finish the tutorial maybe we could get somewhere...
However if you are not Fry (and I sure hope you are not) then I highly recommend this game. It is quite fun to tease the old noggin' with some puzzles, especially when they are science themed!
And for those of you who arn't so science oriented and only moderetly enjoy puzzles (what is wrong with you!!!!!!) then there is a fun and interesting story line to follow with a few twists like any good book. 
Now stop reading this and go have fun... with Science!

Portal 2 is a fantastic experience. When I first played this years ago the characters are funny and the voice acting is top notch as well with the story. Valve has done it again because people were suspicous with the multiplayer. No not deathmatch with portals what would be stupid. They included a fun co-op mode that is set AFTER the events of Portal 2. Even more fun is that it comes with a level editor and can download co-op, and single player maps for endless replayablity. Oh and lets not forget.. HAAAAAAAAAAAAATS.
Ótimo jogo mto foda uma das melhores histórias que já vi
Such fun. Much puzzles.
This game was very fun and amusing. I enjoyed every part of it, especially the characters.

Juego de puzzles con una historia bastasnte interesante y graficos bastante bueno. Unos personajes simpatiquisimos y repleto de humor inteligente. Puzzles que te quedaras pensando por horas y mecanicas de lo mas interesante y origninales. La herramienta de creacion solo le da mñas hora de juegho permitiendote crear tus propios puzzles y jugar a los que la gran comunidad ha creado. Juegazo tanto este como la primera parte.
i love portal 2 but for some reason it crashes now when every i start it up
Funny single player.  Coop is fun and the game can actually be challenging, which is a good thing.
Awesome!
Excellent game, incredible storyline and development, puzzles are beautifully balanced. It's a perfect continuation of the first game, with so many new features and challenges. It's a must play

The best coop game!!!!!!!!!!! delight! 11 out of 10!!!!! it's just a mixture Portal and wall-e ! and the most pleasant thing - you're the Main character )))

Самая наикрутейшая кооп игра!!!!!!!!!!! восторг! 11 из 10!!!!!  это просто смесь Portal и  Валл-и ! и самое приятное - ты ГГ )))
me encanta :3
Great Game recomend to all.

This game made me lose my job, my wife, my car, my house.
 I named my pet hedgehog chell, spent 6 months building a replica of wheatley, only watch porn of women that look like chell, and I lost all my friends because they didn't want me to call them atlas or P-body
This game has ruined my life, this addiction has become bigger and bigger every time I play it




5 stars
great game
Greatest puzle game ive played
Ein geniales Denkspiel- mit einer genialen Singelplayer Story.
It's Portal 2. Buy it b*#ch.

Portal 2 é um jogo que inovou os jogos do gênero Puzzle trazendo elementos inovadores onde em nenhum jogo foi colocado até hoje. Um excelente jogo para ''perder'' os neurônios proporcionando uma dimensão incrível e bons gráficos. Altamente recomendável.
Любишь не понимать тебе сюда.
Portal 2 was an awesome comeback from Portal and it still is. One of the best games valve ever released. I give it 9.7 out of 10
Most innovative puzzle game ever! Must have for anyone with brains... even better in co-op mode :)
Je to skvelá hra odporučam všetkým
it's by valve so that's all you should need to know
dt8of

Aperture Science returns in this excellent sequel, maintaining the charm of the original game while also presenting new characters and gameplay aspects to keep things interesting, and, quite often, absurdly hilarious.
Not as good as the first one.
amazing game, love the ending. cant believe it took me this long to play it
ZEREI EM APENAS 9 HORAS ! (E VC EM QUANTAS HORAS ZERARIA!)
Not a first person shooter. It is an amazing first person puzzle, adventure game. The storyline is good.

Honestly an amazing game,  very story driven, amazing graphics for an old game and the voice acting is unbelievebal. Puzzles are not too hard so you can continue on without it affecting your gameplay.


If your looking for a fun, hilarious and engaging gaming experience pick Portal 2

On a side note you do not need to play the orignal to understand the story, but it helps.

-ClimbRider
Fantastic game, and when you're done, there's the co-op!
esta muy bueno, en especial jugar en Coop!!
The story is awesome and hilraious. If you havn't gotten this game yet, don't' even have second thought (though make sure you play the first one first). This game is awesome! 10/10
BEST EBÅR
Que des barres en coop !:p2blue:
once played it be part of you for ever so much fun you will want play this over and over again

Отличное продолжение первой части! Сюжет длиннее, загадки разнообразнее, сюжетные повороты на месте, эпичность присутствует. Путешествие по старой лаборатории Aperture очень погружает в атмосферу вселенной Portal.

Сложность выше чем в первой части и не все головоломки мне поддались, иногда приходилось смотреть прохождение, но это не испортило впечатление от игры.

И вроде сюжет вроде не намекает на продолжение, но очень надеюсь что Portal 3 будет, ведь в индустрии очень не хватает таких увлекательных и развивающих игр.

GLADOS is watching you...

Концентрат из всего-того, что нам полюбилось по первой части, приумноженный и улучшенный) Масштаб и размах происходящего так же заметно увеличился) Оригинальный юмор первой части - на месте) К тому же мы получаем два приключения сразу (присутствует кооператив, где мы играем за одного из чудоковатых роботов-тестеров) Весело, зрелищно, атмосферно)))

please stand by...

Okay let's get right to the point. 
This is possibly the best game i have ever played!
Amazing story, funny characters and an ending that made me raise up and clap in my hands.
This is probably the best game Valve is going to make. 
At least while we wait for Half-Life 3.

10/10
Melhor jogo de Puzzle ja feito :)
Интересная головоломка с интересным сюжетом!

One of the BEST puzzle games out there. It has a deep story so it's not just plain old puzzles. If you remember the F-Stops from the alpha, look at how much this game has changed. Also, valve, we want F-Stops for DLC!!!

Esse é simplismente um dos melhores (ou o melhor) jogo que eu já tive a oportunidade de jogar. Ele é incrível em todos os aspectos. Recomendo a qualquer pessoa. É perfeito, 10/10.

great game, great stort telling, challenging. really waiting for a sequel...

Просто чудова гра! Пройшов усю і задоволений! Різноманітність рівнів затягує в гру ,а сам сюжет змушує переживати емоції головної героїні.Неперевершена гра, навіть після проходження дозволяє грати у себе, приваблюючи створенням своїх кімнат та проходження уже створених іншими гравцями!
The perfect synergy of excellent gameplay meets brilliant story. Wheatley is one of my all-time favourite characters.
Absolute fun
Precioso, increible, bonito... Un obra maestra.

apesar do modo single player ser bem curto... ele é bem divertido.
ainda nao tive tempo de experimentar o modo coop, mas pelo video de introduçao, parece ser realmente bom

One of the best games of the last 10 years. Its pacing, comedy, creative (but not too hard) pussles and characters make this game almost perfect. Also with community made maps and co-op this game has far more replay value than just the single player storyline.
i don't really like.. it only killed my real life...
A very good and challenging game, where the end is worth everything.

If you played Portal 1 and liked it, you are going to love Portal 2, it has everything that the previous game had to offer and much more!

The campaign is much larger than the previous one, with a bunch of new mechanics as well. What really shines here though is the fantastic voice acting from the antagonists, Wheatley is hilarious with his british accent and GLaDOS just being cynical and awesome as always!
It has a lot more challenges as well and the multiplayer works perfectly. 

The game is a masterpiece indeed!
One of the awesomest games to play co-op with your friends. I wish Valve would make portal 3 :D
꿀잼레알 꿀잼임 ㅇ

This Is Probably the best game ever. This is a freaking must-have for anyone who loves a good puzzle, and good comedy. This game is also full of easter eggs, deep meaning, and its whole story is huge. This also applies to the first game, but a lot more to the second, IMO. Anyway  this game is awsome.
I like this game but I would like to be able to play it on Linux. No hurry. You guys have done fantastic work and I'm grateful for what you've done to make my gaming experience good.

Portal is unique..there's no bam bam -pew pew-rattattatta and xplosions  gameplay . Like with OG Portal . Portal 2  is bout 
using ur wits ...and Valve made sure that every knucklehead could overcome the puzzles in the game ...time given.
Portal series main attraction is the lightness of the the story .P2  although its obviously inbound / or at least paralell to the Half Life Series...doesnt send you into a grim world.

whacky entertainment that makes use of that thing between ur ears from time to time 
every cent is spent well here
thumbs up
not better then bad rats

What a delightful game to play, that's how I define Portal 2. The first had been very good, but the second can be even better, the gameplay is unique, the puzzles are interesting and warrant a good deal of satisfaction when solved, especially those that you have more trouble passing. Enjoyed the development a lot, the idea of the 2 robots and how you interact with them, brilliant, and the ending is very good and comforting too. The graphics are beautiful, the sounds, perfect, I can not imagine any defect to assign to it, perhaps it could be longer. Now I want to try cooperative with a friend.

9/10

Just for presentation alone is Portal 2 worth it. 

The graphics are amazing, the gameplay is tight, and the puzzles makes you feel smart for solving them. Best of all, the game is incredibly funny! I found myself laughing LOUDLY at many of the scenes! 

Worth it.

This game was created very well. Most games with many levels such as this tend to become very boring and repetitive very quickly, yet this game frequently changes up the combination of challenges to keep interest high. Fun and makes you critically think without knowing you are excercising your brain. BUY IT NOW!
The dialogue alone makes this worth a try.
This game is awesome. Buy it, buy it now!

This is absolutely, indeniably my favorite video game of all the video games I've played up to this point in my life.
One word; Incredible. Need I say more
Jogo super inteligente, nos faz raciocinar. Horas de diversão.

Einfach nur herrlich, so viel Liebe zum Detail. Smart und humorvoll ohne zu fordernd zu sein.
Ein atmosphärischer Leckerbissen.
Gutes Spiel
Pretty flawless game. Its funny, great story, etc.

This game is one of my favorites. I love how you can make your own chambers, so Portal 2 can never get boring. The animation is great, I LOVE the plot twists, and this is overall an award-winning game.
great game ... even better than portal 1 ... glados is funny ... and the story is just great

man what a great game all the way to the end I waited far too long to play this game. 
Do recommend anyone who hasnt played this game just play it. It's great.

Trés bien pensé, stimulant,  un scénario passionnant et des personnages toujours trés droles.
Ce jeu apporte de la fraicheur au monde du jeux video il sort de l'ordinaire, l'idée des portail est tout simplement unique. 
Par contre, ne vous attendez pas un jeux d'action du genre shoot, vous vous ennuierez beaucoup. Ce jeu est basé sur la reflexion.   
Le mood coopération est egalement exellent, de quoi bien s'amuser.
i love this game more than i love my life
